Reviews.Title: Fantastic Gaming PC
Reviews.Author: stewar35
Reviews.Content: After experiencing great disappointment of just having purchased a DELL XPS less than 2 years ago, CyberpowerPC has solved my laptop gaming woes.  This system is a great value for the money you invest in a new laptop.  It has the memory, processor, and design needed to sustain the PC gamer in the most intense and taxing of gaming experiences.  Don't waist your time and money on any Dell or Dell owned platform like "Alienware", the guys at CyberpowerPC have got it together.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-4700MQ
16 GB SO-DIMM
1024 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen, NVIDIA GeForce GTX770M
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: CyberpowerPC FANGBOOK EVO HFX7-500 17.3-Inch Laptop
